forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with scattered thunderstorms arriving for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with scattered thunderstorms arriving for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 74F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
